get.description: Lists the available Azure Data Factory API operations.

schema.description: A list of operations that can be performed by the Data Factory service.

nextLink.description: The link to the next page of results, if any remaining results exist.

value.description: List of Data Factory operations supported by the Data Factory resource provider.

items.description: Azure Data Factory API operation definition.

operation.description: The type of operation: get, read, delete, etc.

resource.description: The name of the resource type on which the operation is performed.

origin.description: The intended executor of the operation.

logSpecifications.description: Details about operations related to logs.

items.description: Details about an operation related to logs.

blobDuration.description: Blobs created in the customer storage account, per hour.

name.description: The name of the log category.

metricSpecifications.description: Details about operations related to metrics.

items.description: Details about an operation related to metrics.

availabilities.description: Defines how often data for metrics becomes available.

items.description: Defines how often data for a metric becomes available.

blobDuration.description: Blob created in the customer storage account, per hour.

displayName.description: The display name of the metric dimension.

name.description: The name of the dimension for the metric.

toBeExportedForShoebox.description: Whether the dimension should be exported to Azure Monitor.

displayName.description: Localized display name of the metric.

enableRegionalMdmAccount.description: Whether or not the service is using regional MDM accounts.

sourceMdmAccount.description: The name of the MDM account.

sourceMdmNamespace.description: The name of the MDM namespace.

unit.description: The unit that the metric is measured in.

default.description: An error response received from the Azure Data Factory service.

post.description: Get Data Plane access.

schema.description: Get Data Plane read only token response definition.

accessToken.description: Data Plane read only access token.

accessResourcePath.description: The resource path to get access relative to factory. Currently only empty string is supported which corresponds to the factory resource.

expireTime.description: Expiration time for the token. Maximum duration for the token is eight hours and by default the token will expire in eight hours.

permissions.description: The string with permissions for Data Plane access. Currently only 'r' is supported which grants read only access.

profileName.description: The name of the profile. Currently only the default is supported. The default value is DefaultProfile.

startTime.description: Start time for the token. If not specified the current time will be used.

default.description: An error response received from the Azure Data Factory service.

get.description: Get a pipeline run by its run ID.

durationInMs.description: The duration of a pipeline run.

invokedBy.description: Entity that started the pipeline run.

id.description: The ID of the entity that started the run.

invokedByType.description: The type of the entity that started the run.

name.description: Name of the entity that started the pipeline run.

isLatest.description: Indicates if the recovered pipeline run is the latest in its group.

lastUpdated.description: The last updated timestamp for the pipeline run event in ISO8601 format.

message.description: The message from a pipeline run.

parameters.description: The full or partial list of parameter name, value pair used in the pipeline run.

runEnd.description: The end time of a pipeline run in ISO8601 format.

runGroupId.description: Identifier that correlates all the recovery runs of a pipeline run.

runStart.description: The start time of a pipeline run in ISO8601 format.

status.description: The status of a pipeline run.

default.description: An error response received from the Azure Data Factory service.

post.description: Cancel a pipeline run by its run ID.

parameters.description: If true, cancel all the Child pipelines that are triggered by the current pipeline.
parameters.name: isRecursive

200.description: Pipeline run has been canceled successfully.

default.description: An error response received from the Azure Data Factory service.

post.description: Query activity runs based on input filter conditions.

continuationToken.description: The continuation token for getting the next page of results, if any remaining results exist, null otherwise.

items.description: Information about an activity run in a pipeline.

activityRunEnd.description: The end time of the activity run in 'ISO 8601' format.

activityRunId.description: The id of the activity run.

activityRunStart.description: The start time of the activity run in 'ISO 8601' format.

durationInMs.description: The duration of the activity run.

error.description: The error if any from the activity run.

linkedServiceName.description: The name of the compute linked service.

pipelineRunId.description: The id of the pipeline run.

status.description: The status of the activity run.

default.description: An error response received from the Azure Data Factory service.

continuationToken.description: The continuation token for getting the next page of results. Null for first page.

items.description: Query filter option for listing runs.

operand.description: Parameter name to be used for filter. The allowed operands to query pipeline runs are PipelineName, RunStart, RunEnd and Status; to query activity runs are ActivityName, ActivityRunStart, ActivityRunEnd, ActivityType and Status, and to query trigger runs are TriggerName, TriggerRunTimestamp and Status.

operator.description: Operator to be used for filter.

lastUpdatedAfter.description: The time at or after which the run event was updated in 'ISO 8601' format.

lastUpdatedBefore.description: The time at or before which the run event was updated in 'ISO 8601' format.

items.description: An object to provide order by options for listing runs.

orderBy.description: Parameter name to be used for order by. requestBody.description: Pipeline resource definition.

post.description: Creates a run of a pipeline.

parameters.description: The pipeline run identifier. If run ID is specified the parameters of the specified run will be used to create a new run.
parameters.name: referencePipelineRunId

parameters.description: Recovery mode flag. If recovery mode is set to true, the specified referenced pipeline run and the new run will be grouped under the same groupId.
parameters.name: isRecovery

parameters.description: In recovery mode, the rerun will start from this activity. If not specified, all activities will run.
parameters.name: startActivityName

schema.description: Response body with a run identifier.

default.description: An error response received from the Azure Data Factory service.

durationInMs.description: The duration of a pipeline run.

invokedBy.description: Entity that started the pipeline run.

id.description: The ID of the entity that started the run.

invokedByType.description: The type of the entity that started the run.

name.description: Name of the entity that started the pipeline run.

isLatest.description: Indicates if the recovered pipeline run is the latest in its group.

lastUpdated.description: The last updated timestamp for the pipeline run event in ISO8601 format.

message.description: The message from a pipeline run.

parameters.description: The full or partial list of parameter name, value pair used in the pipeline run.

runEnd.description: The end time of a pipeline run in ISO8601 format.

runGroupId.description: Identifier that correlates all the recovery runs of a pipeline run.

status.description: The status of a pipeline run.

lastUpdated.description: The last updated timestamp for the pipeline run event in ISO8601 format.

message.description: The message from a pipeline run.

parameters.description: The full or partial list of parameter name, value pair used in the pipeline run.

annotations.description: List of tags that can be used for describing the trigger.

properties.description: Trigger that schedules pipeline reruns for all fixed time interval windows from a requested start time to requested end time.

maxConcurrency.description: The max number of parallel time windows (ready for execution) for which a rerun is triggered.

requestedEndTime.description: The end time for the time period for which restatement is initiated. Only UTC time is currently supported.

requestedStartTime.description: The start time for the time period for which restatement is initiated. Only UTC time is currently supported.

eTag.description: Etag identifies change in the resource.

continuationToken.description: The continuation token for getting the next page of results. Null for first page.

items.description: Query filter option for listing runs.

operand.description: Parameter name to be used for filter. The allowed operands to query pipeline runs are PipelineName, RunStart, RunEnd and Status; to query activity runs are ActivityName, ActivityRunStart, ActivityRunEnd, ActivityType and Status, and to query trigger runs are TriggerName, TriggerRunTimestamp and Status.

operator.description: Operator to be used for filter.

lastUpdatedAfter.description: The time at or after which the run event was updated in 'ISO 8601' format.

lastUpdatedBefore.description: The time at or before which the run event was updated in 'ISO 8601' format.

items.description: An object to provide order by options for listing runs.

orderBy.description: Parameter name to be used for order by. The allowed parameters to order by for pipeline runs are PipelineName, RunStart, RunEnd and Status; for activity runs are ActivityName, ActivityRunStart, ActivityRunEnd and Status; for trigger runs are TriggerName, TriggerRunTimestamp and Status.

etag.description: Etag identifies change in the resource.

annotations.description: List of tags that can be used for describing the trigger.

properties.description: List of property name and value related to trigger run. Name, value pair depends on type of trigger.

triggeredPipelines.description: List of pipeline name and run Id triggered by the trigger run.

continuationToken.description: The continuation token for getting the next page of results, if any remaining results exist, null otherwise.

properties.description: List of property name and value related to trigger run. Name, value pair depends on type of trigger.

triggeredPipelines.description: List of pipeline name and run Id triggered by the trigger run.

concurrentJobsLimit.description: The number of concurrent jobs permitted to run on the integration runtime node. Values between 1 and maxConcurrentJobs(inclusive) are allowed.

autoUpdate.description: The state of integration runtime auto update.

updateDelayOffset.description: The time offset (in hours) in the day, e.g., PT03H is 3 hours. The integration runtime auto update will happen on that time.

UserAccessPolicy.description: Get Data Plane read only token request definition.

accessResourcePath.description: The resource path to get access relative to factory. Currently only empty string is supported which corresponds to the factory resource.

expireTime.description: Expiration time for the token. Maximum duration for the token is eight hours and by default the token will expire in eight hours.

permissions.description: The string with permissions for Data Plane access. Currently only 'r' is supported which grants read only access.

profileName.description: The name of the profile. Currently only the default is supported. The default value is DefaultProfile.

startTime.description: Start time for the token. If not specified the current time will be used.

additionalProperties.description: Definition of a single variable for a Pipeline.

VariableDefinitionSpecification.description: Definition of variable for a Pipeline.
